name: Nomad Group
longname: Webpage of the company Nomad Group
description: The webpage of the company Nomad Group. Built with React, TypeScript and MUI.

name: Eco-tasks
longname: Keep track of your environmentally-friendly choices
description: An app where users can check of environmentally-friendly tasks and gather points to compete with other users in the leaderboard.

name: To-do
description: A to-do project built with React and Redux. Local storage is used to save the store. The package luxon was used to handle dates.

name: Logged in?
longname: Am I logged in? Find out with this webpage.
description: A website where you can sign up, log in and see if you are signed in. The site was built with React, using Node.js and MongoDB to setup the backend.

name: Movies
longname: Find what to watch with this movie-site
description: A website displaying movies based on different categories which you can choose from a drop-down menu. Each movie generated can be clicked on to reach a site where you can read more details about the movie.

name: Happy Thoughts
longname: Twitter-like app for sending happy thoughts
description: Webpage built with React where a user can send happy thoughts, see what are making other people happy and like posts. Backend built with nodejs and MongoDB.

name: The maze
description: A webpage which allows a user to navigate a maze, in the form of a text-based adventure, provided by a backend.

name: Beer Survey
description: Survey built with React where the user can create an order for a beer-calender.

name: Music releases
longname: Website with albums and singles built with React.
description: Website displaying the latest releases of albums and singles with links to spotify, built with React.

name: Weather app
description: A website that displays the weather of the city that you search for.

name: Guess Who
description: Play the game Guess Who!, with two different themes to choose from. Webpage built with JavaScript ES6, HTML and CSS.

name: Chat bot
description: Responsive web site using HTML, CSS and JavaScript ES6 for interesting cat facts

name: GitHub tracker
description: A webpage gathering my GitHub projects performed during the Technigo Bootcamp.

name: Doggy-daycare
longname: Sign up for a doggy daycare using forms
description: Project aimed to introduce forms in HTML and how to style them using CSS.

name: News site
description: Intro project during the Technigo Bootcamp, built with HTML and CSS. The aim was to create a SPA with news-articles
